The id of resource instance to which the workbook will be associated
The unique guid for this workbook instance

VMPriceAll
| where type=="Consumption"
| project armskuname
| where armskuname startswith "Standard"
| where isnotempty(armskuname)| extend s=split(armskuname, '_')
| extend Vmfamily=case(
substring(s[1], 0, 1) in ("A","D","E","F","L","M") and substring(s[2], 0, 1)=="v",strcat(s[0],'_', substring(s[1], 0, 1),'_', s[2]),
substring(s[1], 0, 1) in ("A","D","E","F","L","M"),strcat(s[0],'_', substring(s[1], 0, 1)),
substring(s[1], 0, 1)=="B",strcat(s[0],'_', substring(s[1], 0, 1)),
substring(s[1], 0, 2)=="GS",strcat(s[0],'_', substring(s[1], 0, 2)),
substring(s[1], 0, 2)in ("HB","NC","NV","PB","ND") and substring(s[2], 0, 1)=="v",strcat(s[0],'_', substring(s[1], 0, 2),'_', s[2]),
substring(s[1], 0, 1) in("H","G"),strcat(s[0],'_', substring(s[1], 0, 1)),
substring(s[1], 0, 2)in ("HB","NC","NV","PB","ND","NP"),strcat(s[0],'_', substring(s[1], 0, 2)),
                armskuname)
| distinct Vmfamily
| sort by Vmfamily asc ","crossComponentResources":["{Workspace}"],"value":["Standard_D_v3","Standard_B","Standard_D","Standard_D_v2","Standard_D_v4","Standard_E_v3","Standard_E_v4","Standard_F","Standard_F_v2"],"typeSettings":{"additionalResourceOptions":["value::all"]},"timeContext":{"durationMs":0},"timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"}],"style":"pills","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"usesamefamily","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"selected"},"name":"parameters - 2 - Copy"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"let workstart={PeakHourStart};
let workend={PeakHourEnd};
let timezoneoffset=4;
{VMSizeList}
let inv=VMComputer
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where AzureSubscriptionId in ({subscription:subid}) or '*' in ({subscription:subid})
| where tostring(split(_ResourceId,'/')[4])  in ({rg}) or '*' in ({rg})
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ResourceId=_ResourceId
| project ResourceId , Computer , AzureSize ,Cpus , CpuSpeed ,PhysicalMemoryMB;
let cpu=InsightsMetrics
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| extend hour=datetime_part("hour", TimeGenerated)+timezoneoffset
| where hour between (workstart..workend)
| where Namespace == "Processor" 
| where Name == "UtilizationPercentage"
| summarize (cpu_p50,cpu_p95)=percentiles(Val,50,95),cpu_avg=avg(Val) by Computer, ResourceId=_ResourceId;
let mem=
InsightsMetrics
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| extend hour=datetime_part("hour", TimeGenerated)+timezoneoffset
| where Namespace == "Memory" 
| where Name == "AvailableMB"
| extend MemorySize = round(todouble(parse_json(Tags).["vm.azm.ms/memorySizeMB"]),0)
| extend MemUtil=(MemorySize-Val)/MemorySize*100
|summarize (mem_p95)=percentiles(MemUtil,95) by  Computer, ResourceId=_ResourceId;
let iops=
InsightsMetrics
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| extend hour=datetime_part("hour", TimeGenerated)+timezoneoffset
| where Namespace == "LogicalDisk" 
| where Name == "TransfersPerSecond"
|summarize (iops_p95)=percentiles(Val,95) by  Computer, ResourceId=_ResourceId;
let nwsent=InsightsMetrics
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| extend hour=datetime_part("hour", TimeGenerated)+timezoneoffset
| where Namespace == "Network"
| where Name == "WriteBytesPerSecond" 
|summarize (nwsent)=percentiles(Val,95) by  Computer, ResourceId=_ResourceId;
let nwrec=InsightsMetrics
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| extend hour=datetime_part("hour", TimeGenerated)+timezoneoffset
| where Namespace == "Network"
| where Name == "ReadBytesPerSecond" 
|summarize (nwrec)=percentiles(Val,95) by  Computer, ResourceId=_ResourceId;
let boot=Syslog
| where Facility =="daemon"
| where SyslogMessage startswith "Startup finished" 
| where ProcessID == 1 
|summarize bootcount=count() by Computer, ResourceId=_ResourceId
|union  isfuzzy=true (Event
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where EventLog == "System" 
| where EventID == 1074 
|summarize bootcount=count() by Computer, ResourceId=_ResourceId);
let logons=SecurityEvent
| where EventID == 4624
| where LogonTypeName  =="10 - RemoteInteractive" 
| where Account !contains "Font Driver Host"  and  Account !contains "Window Manager"
| summarize ['SSH/RDP']=count() by Computer, ResourceId=_ResourceId
|union  isfuzzy=true (Syslog
| where Facility == "auth"
| where SyslogMessage startswith "Accepted password for" or SyslogMessage startswith "Accepted publickey for"
| summarize ['SSH/RDP']=count() by Computer, ResourceId=_ResourceId);
let vmcon=VMConnection
| where Direction == "inbound" 
| where SourceIp <> "127.0.0.1" 
| summarize InboundCon=sum(LinksEstablished+LinksTerminated+LinksLive) by Computer, ResourceId=_ResourceId;
inv
| join kind= leftouter (
   cpu
) on ResourceId
| join kind= leftouter (
   mem
) on ResourceId
| join kind= leftouter (
   iops
) on ResourceId
| join kind= leftouter (
   vmcon
) on ResourceId
| join kind= leftouter (
   vmsize
) on $left.AzureSize==$right.Name
|project Computer, AzureSize, Cpus,CpuSpeed, cpu_p95, mem_p95 , iops_p95 ,RAM=PhysicalMemoryMB,Disks,maxIops=Disks*500 ,ResourceId
| extend VmFamily=tostring(split(AzureSize,'_')[1])
| extend Fm1=substring(VmFamily,0,1) 
| extend Fm2=substring(VmFamily,1,1)
| extend Vmfamily=iff(Fm2 matches regex "[0-9]", Fm1, strcat(Fm1,Fm2))
|extend ramneed= RAM*mem_p95/100+500
| extend newram= case(
ramneed<0,RAM,
ramneed<1024,1024,
ramneed<2048,2048,
ramneed<3584,3584,
ramneed<4096,4096,
ramneed<7168,7168,
ramneed<8192,8192,
ramneed<14336,14336,
ramneed<16386,16384,
ramneed<28672,28672,
ramneed<32768,32768,0
)
| extend cpu_resize=iff(cpu_p95<toint("{CPUThreshold}") and Cpus !=1 ,"yes", "no")
| extend mem_resize=iff(mem_p95<toint("{MEMThreshold}") and newram < RAM,"yes", "no")
| extend iops_resize=iff(iops_p95<(maxIops*0.4),"yes", "no")
| extend newcpu= toint(iff (Cpus <= 2,2, Cpus/2))
| extend  CanResize=iff(cpu_resize =="yes" and mem_resize=="yes" and iops_resize == "yes" , "Resizing Possible","Resizing not Possible")
| summarize CountofVMs=count() by CanResize

workstart={PeakHourStart};
let workend={PeakHourEnd};
let timezoneoffset=4;
{VMSizeList}
{VMPriceAll}
let inv=VMComputer
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where AzureSubscriptionId in ({subscription:subid}) or '*' in ({subscription:subid})
| where tostring(split(_ResourceId,'/')[4])  in ({rg}) or '*' in ({rg})
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ResourceId=_ResourceId
| project ResourceId , Computer , AzureSize ,Cpus , CpuSpeed ,PhysicalMemoryMB, AzureLocation
| where isnotempty(AzureSize);
let cpu=InsightsMetrics
    | where TimeGenerated >ago(30d)
| extend hour=datetime_part("hour", TimeGenerated) + timezoneoffset
| where hour between (workstart..workend)
| where Namespace == "Processor"
| where Name == "UtilizationPercentage"
| summarize (Cpu)= round(percentile(Val, 99), 2) by Computer, ResourceId=_ResourceId;
let mem= InsightsMetrics
    | where TimeGenerated >ago(30d)
| extend hour=datetime_part("hour", TimeGenerated) + timezoneoffset
| where Namespace == "Memory"
| where Name == "AvailableMB"
| extend MemorySize = round(todouble(parse_json(Tags).["vm.azm.ms/memorySizeMB"]), 0)
| extend Val=(MemorySize - Val) / MemorySize*100
| summarize (Mem)= round(percentile(Val, 99), 2) by Computer, ResourceId=_ResourceId;
let iops= InsightsMetrics
    | where TimeGenerated >ago(30d)
| extend hour=datetime_part("hour", TimeGenerated) + timezoneoffset
| where Namespace == "LogicalDisk"
| where Name == "TransfersPerSecond"
| summarize (IOPs)= round(percentile(Val, 99), 2) by Computer, ResourceId=_ResourceId;
let table=inv
| join kind= leftouter (cpu) on ResourceId
| join kind= leftouter (mem) on ResourceId
| join kind= leftouter (iops) on ResourceId
| join kind= fullouter (vmsize) on $left.AzureSize == $right.Name
| project Computer, AzureSize, Cpus, CpuSpeed, Cpu, Mem, IOPs, PhysicalMemoryMB, Disks, maxIops=Disks * 500, ResourceId,AzureLocation
| extend minMemoryReq= PhysicalMemoryMB*Mem / 100 + 500
| extend newram= case(minMemoryReq < 0, PhysicalMemoryMB, minMemoryReq < 512, 512, minMemoryReq < 768, 768, minMemoryReq < 1024, 1024, minMemoryReq < 1792, 1792, minMemoryReq < 2048, 2048, minMemoryReq < 3584, 3584, minMemoryReq < 4096, 4096, minMemoryReq < 7168, 7168, minMemoryReq < 8192, 8192, minMemoryReq < 14336, 14336, minMemoryReq < 16384, 16384, minMemoryReq < 28672, 28672, minMemoryReq < 32768, 32768, minMemoryReq < 49152, 49152, minMemoryReq < 57344, 57344, minMemoryReq < 65536, 65536, minMemoryReq < 81920, 81920, minMemoryReq < 98304, 98304, minMemoryReq < 114688, 114688, minMemoryReq < 131072, 131072, minMemoryReq < 143360, 143360, minMemoryReq < 147456, 147456, minMemoryReq < 163840, 163840, minMemoryReq < 196608, 196608, minMemoryReq < 224000, 224000, minMemoryReq < 229376, 229376, minMemoryReq < 262144, 262144, minMemoryReq < 393216, 393216, minMemoryReq < 442368, 442368, minMemoryReq < 448000, 448000, minMemoryReq < 458752, 458752, minMemoryReq < 466944, 466944, minMemoryReq < 516096, 516096, minMemoryReq < 524288, 524288, minMemoryReq < 896000, 896000, minMemoryReq < 1024000, 1024000, minMemoryReq < 1048576, 1048576, minMemoryReq < 1792000, 1792000, minMemoryReq < 1835008, 1835008, minMemoryReq < 
2048000, 2048000, minMemoryReq < 2097152, 2097152, minMemoryReq < 2918400, 2918400, minMemoryReq < 3891200, 3891200, minMemoryReq < 3985408, 3985408, minMemoryReq < 4194304, 4194304, minMemoryReq < 5836800, 5836800, 0)
| extend cpu_resize=iff(Cpu < toint("{CPUThreshold}") and Cpus != 1, "yes", "no")
| extend mem_resize=iff(Mem < toint("{MEMThreshold}") and newram < PhysicalMemoryMB, "yes", "no")
| extend iops_resize=iff(IOPs < (maxIops*0.4), "yes", "no")

| where cpu_resize =="yes" and mem_resize=="yes" and iops_resize == "yes" ;
let finaltable=table
| join kind= leftouter (vmsize | project Name, vcores=toint(vcores), Ram, Disks) on $left.newcpu==$right.vcores 
| where Ram <= PhysicalMemoryMB and Ram >= minMemoryReq

| extend s=split(Name, '_')
| extend VmfamilyTarget=case(
substring(s[1], 0, 1) in ("A","D","E","F","L","M") and substring(s[2], 0, 1)=="v",strcat(s[0],'_', substring(s[1], 0, 1),'_', s[2]),
substring(s[1], 0, 1) in ("A","D","E","F","L","M"),strcat(s[0],'_', substring(s[1], 0, 1)),
substring(s[1], 0, 1)=="B",strcat(s[0],'_', substring(s[1], 0, 1)),
substring(s[1], 0, 2)=="GS",strcat(s[0],'_', substring(s[1], 0, 2)),
substring(s[1], 0, 2)in ("HB","NC","NV","PB","ND") and substring(s[2], 0, 1)=="v",strcat(s[0],'_', substring(s[1], 0, 2),'_', s[2]),
substring(s[1], 0, 1) in("H","G"),strcat(s[0],'_', substring(s[1], 0, 1)),
substring(s[1], 0, 2)in ("HB","NC","NV","PB","ND","NP"),strcat(s[0],'_', substring(s[1], 0, 2)),
                Name)
| extend y=split(AzureSize, '_')
| extend VmfamilyCurrent=case(
substring(y[1], 0, 1) in ("A","D","E","F","L","M") and substring(y[2], 0, 1)=="v",strcat(y[0],'_', substring(y[1], 0, 1),'_', y[2]),
substring(y[1], 0, 1) in ("A","D","E","F","L","M"),strcat(y[0],'_', substring(y[1], 0, 1)),
substring(y[1], 0, 1)=="B",strcat(y[0],'_', substring(y[1], 0, 1)),
substring(y[1], 0, 2)=="GS",strcat(y[0],'_', substring(y[1], 0, 2)),
substring(y[1], 0, 2)in ("HB","NC","NV","PB","ND") and substring(y[2], 0, 1)=="v",strcat(y[0],'_', substring(y[1], 0, 2),'_', y[2]),
substring(y[1], 0, 1) in("H","G"),strcat(y[0],'_', substring(y[1], 0, 1)),
substring(y[1], 0, 2)in ("HB","NC","NV","PB","ND","NP"),strcat(y[0],'_', substring(y[1], 0, 2)),
                AzureSize)
| where AzureSize != Name  and   iff("{usesamefamily:value}"=="same",VmfamilyTarget == VmfamilyCurrent,VmfamilyTarget  in ({VMFamilyFilter}) or '*' in ({VMFamilyFilter}))
| sort by Ram asc 
| join kind=leftouter hint.strategy=shuffle (VMPriceAll| where type=="Consumption"| project  armskuname,VMCost=unitprice,Location) on $left.AzureLocation==$right.Location and $left.AzureSize==$right.armskuname
| join kind=leftouter hint.strategy=shuffle (VMPriceAll| where type=="Consumption"| project  armskuname,NewVMCost=unitprice,Location) on $left.AzureLocation==$right.Location and $left.Name==$right.armskuname
| join kind=leftouter hint.strategy=shuffle (VMPriceAll|  where reservationterm == "1 Year"| project  armskuname,NewVM_RI1Y=unitprice,Location,reservationterm) on $left.AzureLocation==$right.Location and $left.Name==$right.armskuname
| join kind=leftouter hint.strategy=shuffle (VMPriceAll|  where reservationterm == "3 Years"| project  armskuname,NewVM_RI3Y=unitprice,Location,reservationterm) on $left.AzureLocation==$right.Location and $left.Name==$right.armskuname
| extend  VMCost=VMCost*730, NewVMCost=NewVMCost*730, NewVM_RI1YCost=NewVM_RI1Y/12,NewVM_RI3YCost=NewVM_RI3Y/36
|extend DiffPayg=VMCost-NewVMCost, DiffRI1=VMCost-NewVM_RI1YCost,DiffRI3=VMCost-NewVM_RI3YCost
| where NewVMCost < VMCost
| project Computer, AzureSize, NewSize=Name,VMCost,NewVMCost,ResourceId,DiffPayg,DiffRI1,DiffRI3,vcores,Ram,NewVM_RI1YCost,NewVM_RI3YCost;
finaltable
| summarize arg_max(DiffPayg,*) by ResourceId
| join kind=leftouter (finaltable
|sort by ResourceId,NewVMCost asc
| summarize possibleSizes = makelist(pack('size', strcat(NewSize , '|',NewVMCost,' | ',vcores,'|',Ram))) by ResourceId,AzureSize
) on ResourceId

| join kind= leftouter (vmsize | project Name, vcores=toint(vcores), Ram, Disks) on $left.newcpu==$right.vcores

substring(y[1], 0, 1) in("H","G"),strcat(y[0],'_', substring(y[1], 0, 1)),

| join kind=leftouter hint.strategy=shuffle (VMPriceAll| where type=="Consumption"| project  armskuname,NewVMCost=unitprice,Location) on $left.AzureLocation==$right.Location and $left.Name==$right.armskuname
| join kind=leftouter hint.strategy=shuffle (VMPriceAll|  where reservationterm == "1 Year"| project  armskuname,NewVM_RI1Y=unitprice,Location,reservationterm) on $left.AzureLocation==$right.Location and $left.Name==$right.armskuname
| join kind=leftouter hint.strategy=shuffle (VMPriceAll|  where reservationterm == "3 Years"| project  armskuname,NewVM_RI3Y=unitprice,Location,reservationterm) on $left.AzureLocation==$right.Location and $left.Name==$right.armskuname

finaltable
| summarize arg_max(DiffPayg,*) by ResourceId
| summarize DiffPayg=sum(DiffPayg), DiffRI1=sum(DiffRI1),DiffRI3=sum(DiffRI3) by Detail="CurrentVM PayG vs New"

- 1 - Copy - Copy - Copy"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"let workstart={PeakHourStart};
let workend={PeakHourEnd};
let timezoneoffset=4;
{VMSizeList}
{VMPriceAll}
let inv=VMComputer
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where AzureSubscriptionId in ({subscription:subid}) or '*' in ({subscription:subid})
| where tostring(split(_ResourceId,'/')[4])  in ({rg}) or '*' in ({rg})
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ResourceId=_ResourceId
| project ResourceId , Computer , AzureSize ,Cpus , CpuSpeed ,PhysicalMemoryMB, AzureLocation
| where isnotempty(AzureSize);
let cpu=InsightsMetrics
    | where TimeGenerated >ago(30d)
| extend hour=datetime_part("hour", TimeGenerated) + timezoneoffset
| where hour between (workstart..workend)
| where Namespace == "Processor"
| where Name == "UtilizationPercentage"
| summarize (Cpu)= round(percentile(Val, 99), 2) by Computer, ResourceId=_ResourceId;
let mem= InsightsMetrics
    | where TimeGenerated >ago(30d)
| extend hour=datetime_part("hour", TimeGenerated) + timezoneoffset
| where Namespace == "Memory"
| where Name == "AvailableMB"
| extend MemorySize = round(todouble(parse_json(Tags).["vm.azm.ms/memorySizeMB"]), 0)
| extend Val=(MemorySize - Val) / MemorySize*100
| summarize (Mem)= round(percentile(Val, 99), 2) by Computer, ResourceId=_ResourceId;
let iops= InsightsMetrics
    | where TimeGenerated >ago(30d)
| extend hour=datetime_part("hour", TimeGenerated) + timezoneoffset
| where Namespace == "LogicalDisk"
| where Name == "TransfersPerSecond"
| summarize (IOPs)= round(percentile(Val, 99), 2) by Computer, ResourceId=_ResourceId;
let table=inv
| join kind= leftouter (cpu) on ResourceId
| join kind= leftouter (mem) on ResourceId
| join kind= leftouter (iops) on ResourceId
| join kind= fullouter (vmsize) on $left.AzureSize == $right.Name
| project Computer, AzureSize, Cpus, CpuSpeed, Cpu, Mem, IOPs, PhysicalMemoryMB, Disks, maxIops=Disks * 500, ResourceId,AzureLocation
| extend minMemoryReq= PhysicalMemoryMB*Mem / 100 + 500
| extend newram= case(minMemoryReq < 0, PhysicalMemoryMB, minMemoryReq < 512, 512, minMemoryReq < 768, 768, minMemoryReq < 1024, 1024, minMemoryReq < 1792, 1792, minMemoryReq < 2048, 2048, minMemoryReq < 3584, 3584, minMemoryReq < 4096, 4096, minMemoryReq < 7168, 7168, minMemoryReq < 8192, 8192, minMemoryReq < 14336, 14336, minMemoryReq < 16384, 16384, minMemoryReq < 28672, 28672, minMemoryReq < 32768, 32768, minMemoryReq < 49152, 49152, minMemoryReq < 57344, 57344, minMemoryReq < 65536, 65536, minMemoryReq < 81920, 81920, minMemoryReq < 98304, 98304, minMemoryReq < 114688, 114688, minMemoryReq < 131072, 131072, minMemoryReq < 143360, 143360, minMemoryReq < 147456, 147456, minMemoryReq < 163840, 163840, minMemoryReq < 196608, 196608, minMemoryReq < 224000, 224000, minMemoryReq < 229376, 229376, minMemoryReq < 262144, 262144, minMemoryReq < 393216, 393216, minMemoryReq < 442368, 442368, minMemoryReq < 448000, 448000, minMemoryReq < 458752, 458752, minMemoryReq < 466944, 466944, minMemoryReq < 516096, 516096, minMemoryReq < 524288, 524288, minMemoryReq < 896000, 896000, minMemoryReq < 1024000, 1024000, minMemoryReq < 1048576, 1048576, minMemoryReq < 1792000, 1792000, minMemoryReq < 1835008, 1835008, minMemoryReq < 
2048000, 2048000, minMemoryReq < 2097152, 2097152, minMemoryReq < 2918400, 2918400, minMemoryReq < 3891200, 3891200, minMemoryReq < 3985408, 3985408, minMemoryReq < 4194304, 4194304, minMemoryReq < 5836800, 5836800, 0)
| extend cpu_resize=iff(Cpu < toint("{CPUThreshold}") and Cpus != 1, "yes", "no")
| extend mem_resize=iff(Mem < toint("{MEMThreshold}") and newram < PhysicalMemoryMB, "yes", "no")
| extend iops_resize=iff(IOPs < (maxIops*0.4), "yes", "no") 
| extend newcpu= toint(iff (Cpus <= 2, 2, Cpus/2))
| where cpu_resize =="yes" and mem_resize=="yes" and iops_resize == "yes" ;
let finaltable=table
| join kind= leftouter (vmsize | project Name, vcores=toint(vcores), Ram, Disks) on $left.newcpu==$right.vcores 
| where Ram <= PhysicalMemoryMB and Ram >= minMemoryReq 
| where Name !startswith 'Basic'
// Calculate VM Family for filtering
| extend s=split(Name, '_')
| extend VmfamilyTarget=case(
substring(s[1], 0, 1) in ("A","D","E","F","L","M") and substring(s[2], 0, 1)=="v",strcat(s[0],'_', substring(s[1], 0, 1),'_', s[2]),
substring(s[1], 0, 1) in ("A","D","E","F","L","M"),strcat(s[0],'_', substring(s[1], 0, 1)),
substring(s[1], 0, 1)=="B",strcat(s[0],'_', substring(s[1], 0, 1)),
substring(s[1], 0, 2)=="GS",strcat(s[0],'_', substring(s[1], 0, 2)),
substring(s[1], 0, 2)in ("HB","NC","NV","PB","ND") and substring(s[2], 0, 1)=="v",strcat(s[0],'_', substring(s[1], 0, 2),'_', s[2]),
substring(s[1], 0, 1) in("H","G"),strcat(s[0],'_', substring(s[1], 0, 1)),
substring(s[1], 0, 2)in ("HB","NC","NV","PB","ND","NP"),strcat(s[0],'_', substring(s[1], 0, 2)),
                Name)
| extend y=split(AzureSize, '_')
| extend VmfamilyCurrent=case(
substring(y[1], 0, 1) in ("A","D","E","F","L","M") and substring(y[2], 0, 1)=="v",strcat(y[0],'_', substring(y[1], 0, 1),'_', y[2]),
substring(y[1], 0, 1) in ("A","D","E","F","L","M"),strcat(y[0],'_', substring(y[1], 0, 1)),
substring(y[1], 0, 1)=="B",strcat(y[0],'_', substring(y[1], 0, 1)),
substring(y[1], 0, 2)=="GS",strcat(y[0],'_', substring(y[1], 0, 2)),
substring(y[1], 0, 2)in ("HB","NC","NV","PB","ND") and substring(y[2], 0, 1)=="v",strcat(y[0],'_', substring(y[1], 0, 2),'_', y[2]),
substring(y[1], 0, 1) in("H","G"),strcat(y[0],'_', substring(y[1], 0, 1)),
substring(y[1], 0, 2)in ("HB","NC","NV","PB","ND","NP"),strcat(y[0],'_', substring(y[1], 0, 2)),
                AzureSize)
| where AzureSize != Name  and   iff("{usesamefamily:value}"=="same",VmfamilyTarget == VmfamilyCurrent,VmfamilyTarget  in ({VMFamilyFilter}) or '*' in ({VMFamilyFilter}))
| sort by Ram asc 
| join kind=leftouter hint.strategy=shuffle (VMPriceAll| where type=="Consumption"| project  armskuname,VMCost=unitprice,Location) on $left.AzureLocation==$right.Location and $left.AzureSize==$right.armskuname
| join kind=leftouter hint.strategy=shuffle (VMPriceAll| where type=="Consumption"| project  armskuname,NewVMCost=unitprice,Location) on $left.AzureLocation==$right.Location and $left.Name==$right.armskuname
| join kind=leftouter hint.strategy=shuffle (VMPriceAll|  where reservationterm == "1 Year"| project  armskuname,NewVM_RI1Y=unitprice,Location,reservationterm) on $left.AzureLocation==$right.Location and $left.Name==$right.armskuname
| join kind=leftouter hint.strategy=shuffle (VMPriceAll|  where reservationterm == "3 Years"| project  armskuname,NewVM_RI3Y=unitprice,Location,reservationterm) on $left.AzureLocation==$right.Location and $left.Name==$right.armskuname
| extend  VMCost=VMCost*730, NewVMCost=NewVMCost*730, NewVM_RI1YCost=NewVM_RI1Y/12,NewVM_RI3YCost=NewVM_RI3Y/36
|extend DiffPayg=VMCost-NewVMCost, DiffRI1=VMCost-NewVM_RI1YCost,DiffRI3=VMCost-NewVM_RI3YCost
| where NewVMCost < VMCost
| project Computer, AzureSize, NewSize=Name,VMCost,NewVMCost,ResourceId,DiffPayg,DiffRI1,DiffRI3,vcores,Ram,NewVM_RI1YCost,NewVM_RI3YCost;
finaltable
| summarize arg_max(DiffPayg,*) by ResourceId
| join kind=leftouter (finaltable
|sort by ResourceId,NewVMCost asc
| summarize possibleSizes = makelist(pack('size', strcat(NewSize , '|',NewVMCost,' | ',vcores,'|',Ram))) by ResourceId,AzureSize
) on ResourceId
| project  ResourceId, CurrentSize=AzureSize, NewSize,VMCost,NewVMCost,NewVM_RI1YCost,NewVM_RI3YCost,vcores,Ram,possibleSizes,Computer;

let workend=17;
let timezoneoffset=4;
let cpu=InsightsMetrics
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where tostring(split(_ResourceId,'/')[2])  in ({subscription:subid}) or '*' in ({subscription:subid})
| where tostring(split(_ResourceId,'/')[4])  in ({rg}) or '*' in ({rg})
| extend hour=datetime_part("hour", TimeGenerated)+timezoneoffset
| where hour between (workstart..workend)
| where Namespace == "Processor" 
| where Name == "UtilizationPercentage"
| summarize (cpu_p50,cpu_p95)=percentiles(Val,50,95),cpu_avg=avg(Val) by Computer, ResourceId=_ResourceId;
let mem=
InsightsMetrics
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| extend hour=datetime_part("hour", TimeGenerated)+timezoneoffset
//| where hour between (workstart..workend)
| where Namespace == "Memory" 
| where Name == "AvailableMB"
|summarize (mem_p95)=percentiles(Val,95) by  Computer;
let iops=
InsightsMetrics
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| extend hour=datetime_part("hour", TimeGenerated)+timezoneoffset
//| where hour between (workstart..workend)
| where Namespace == "LogicalDisk" 
| where Name == "TransfersPerSecond"
|summarize (iops_p95)=percentiles(Val,95) by  Computer;
let nwsent=InsightsMetrics
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| extend hour=datetime_part("hour", TimeGenerated)+timezoneoffset
//| where hour between (workstart..workend)
| where Namespace == "Network"
| where Name == "WriteBytesPerSecond" 
|summarize (nwsent)=percentiles(Val,95) by  Computer;
let nwrec=InsightsMetrics
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| extend hour=datetime_part("hour", TimeGenerated)+timezoneoffset
//| where hour between (workstart..workend)
| where Namespace == "Network"
| where Name == "ReadBytesPerSecond" 
|summarize (nwrec)=percentiles(Val,95) by  Computer;
let boot=Syslog
| where Facility =="daemon"
| where SyslogMessage startswith "Startup finished" 
| where ProcessID == 1 
|summarize bootcount=count() by Computer
|union isfuzzy=true (Event
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where EventLog == "System" 
| where EventID == 1074 
|summarize bootcount=count() by Computer);
let logons=SecurityEvent
| where EventID == 4624
| where LogonTypeName  =="10 - RemoteInteractive" 
| where Account !contains "Font Driver Host"  and  Account !contains "Window Manager"
| summarize ['SSH/RDP']=count() by Computer
|union isfuzzy=true  (Syslog
| where Facility == "auth"
| where SyslogMessage startswith "Accepted password for" or SyslogMessage startswith "Accepted publickey for"
| summarize ['SSH/RDP']=count() by Computer);
let vmcon=VMConnection
| where Direction == "inbound" 
| where SourceIp <> "127.0.0.1" 
| summarize InboundCon=sum(LinksEstablished+LinksTerminated+LinksLive) by Computer;
cpu
| join kind= leftouter (
   mem
) on Computer
| join kind= leftouter (
   nwsent
) on Computer
| join kind= leftouter (
   nwrec
) on Computer
| join kind= leftouter (
   boot
) on Computer
| join kind= leftouter (
   logons
) on Computer
| join kind= leftouter (
   iops
) on Computer
| join kind= leftouter (
   vmcon
) on Computer
|project ResourceId,Computer , ['SSH/RDP'] , bootcount ,  cpu_p95 , cpu_avg ,mem_p95,Nw_Sent=format_bytes(nwsent), Nw_Rec=format_bytes(nwrec),InboundCon,iops_p95
